about_the_game:
Join our discord server if you are interested in our game.

Manifest Destiny is a retro top-down perspective puzzle adventure game with arcade-style fast-paced levels and multi-branch story telling.


When a frustrated game developer escapes into his remaining Utopia—the game world, how can he discover the meaning of the existence of virtual characters with the abilities he learned, and the truth behind the fate?



As the “Creator” of the game world, the hero owns an unusual combat style. He can use “Programming” to trigger traps and create chance, use “Art” to rebuild the level and change the landscape, or use “Music” to control the emotion and thinking of both enemies and friendly characters.



At the same time, this set of abilities is suitable for solving puzzles in the game, and brings new probabilities to level, which all depend on your creativity!





Acting a “Good goodness” to help people with kindness, or being a “devil incarnate” and living in a world flowed with the rivers of blood?
In Manifest Destiny, your words and deeds will be recorded by the “Good and Evil system”. Whether it’s killing people and looting, or helping the elder cross the street, it will have a real impact on the story.



Multiple clear ways are available for all levels of the game. You can kill every living creature you meet, or you can use various ways to pass the level peacefully.



But please note: all choices will come with costs. Sometimes costs can lead you to the commanding heights of destiny, however, sometimes these costs will be too expensive for you to bear.





How will a kind and brave developer treat the characters in his fictional story when the virtual and real worlds are gradually blurring?
When your family, friends and banking accounts are all against you pursuing your teenage dreams, will you do everything you can to change their mind?
Or will you bravely discard your past and try to seek redemption in the virtual world?
